entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -7.6°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
